I love Portal 1 but the sequel is much, much better. Sometimes you really need to use your brain to pass a level. 
Also, I really enjoyed playing the edited levels, there are a few which are quite creative and fun.

This is the best game I have ever played. It has unique mechanics, a compelling story, and a satisfying ending. I guarantee you will enjoy this game now and it still holds up despite how old the game is.

I cannot put into words how much I love this game!! A sequel that does not disappoint! Despite the facility being run down, this game is a fresh new take on the basis Portal made. One of my absolute favorite games. Well worth the price!
